title: Three SGC Graded Old Judges --NO LONGER AVAILABLE
author: oldjudge

posts.post_title: Three SGC Graded Old Judges --NO LONGER AVAILABLE
posts.post_content:
Please contact me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url] if interested. 

#1- Beautiful 1887 Jack Clements--Sharp image, slight scrapbook staining on back. Looks a lot better than a 30
#2-Very Sharp image of Count Weber of the 1889 Western Ass'n Sioux City team. The card has some photo loss in the UR, far away from the image
#3-Nice 1889 card of Harry Staley of Pittsburgh. Card has some minor scrapbook removal damage on the back.
